name: Little Rambo 2 - Top Free Arcade Shooting Game
name_original: Little Rambo 2 - Top Free Arcade Shooting Game
description:
Little Rambo 2 - Top Free Arcade Shooting Games

'Little Rambo 2' is an action game starring the lovable hero Little Rambo as he runs, shoots and destroys enemies and hurdles with nothing to lose! Travel through portals to visit exotic world locations, battling Enemies.
Instantly playable and simple to control, the action speeds up and changes gears with every new world.
Run as far as possible and shoot Enemies along the way to amass high scores and collect awards. Upload your best runs to the GameCenter leader board.

Collect Coins to unlock new characters and Powers.

Features:

• Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls.

• Eye popping high definition 3D graphics

• Environments that change every few minutes you play.

• GameCenter leaderboards, achievements and challenges

• Easy but fun game mechanics.

• Hours of addictive gaming!
